body:
It turns out that Greg Ward's solution proposed in his message of 31 
January 2003 is the solution after all. I have now run a number of tests
with two different models and varying numbers of processes and, hence,
varying numbers of processors sharing processes with other programs
running on the same machine. In no case has the bug reared its ugly head.


Thomas
